meta.title: eaves Phillips Ranch - Apartments in Pomona, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves Phillips Ranch - Apartments in Pomona, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Set in a wonderful neighborhood in Pomona is eaves Phillips Ranch – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Pomona apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and central air conditioning. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. With our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Located on Appian Way, eaves Phillips Ranch provides easy access to the 10, 60, 57 and 71 freeways, as well as the Metrolink line. Those looking for entertainment can visit destinations like Westmont Park, the Latino Art Museum and the Pomona Valley Historical Society. Food lovers will not want to miss out on great local eateries near Philips Ranch such as Pomona Valley Mining Company, Coco Palm Restaurant and Sushi Koyo. Philips Ranch Apartment Community Indulge in the convenience of a comfortable lifestyle at eaves Phillips Ranch. This charming apartment community offers residents top-of-the-line facilities including outdoor swimming pools, fitness center, barbecue and grill areas and an on-site business center. Simply put, our apartments in Philips Ranch offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for?

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

a.div: Our apartment homes were designed with you in mind. Learn more about the different finish packages we offer at our community.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

better than you expected.","description":"Set in a wonderful neighborhood in Pomona is eaves Phillips Ranch – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Pomona apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and central air conditioning. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, TV, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. With our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Located on Appian Way, eaves Phillips Ranch provides easy access to the 10, 60, 57 and 71 freeways, as well as the Metrolink line. Those looking for entertainment can visit destinations like Westmont Park, the Latino Art Museum and the Pomona Valley Historical Society. Food lovers will not want to miss out on great local eateries near Philips Ranch such as Pomona Valley Mining Company, Coco Palm Restaurant and Sushi Koyo. Philips Ranch Apartment Community Indulge in the convenience of a comfortable lifestyle at eaves Phillips Ranch. This charming apartment community offers residents top-of-the-line facilities including outdoor swimming pools, fitness center, barbecue and grill areas and an on-site business center. Simply put, our apartments in Philips Ranch offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for?
